comments.en:
aka CopyJet

For basic printing functionality use the HPIJS driver . For advanced functionality such as printer status and maintenance features, use the HPLIP driver (which includes HPIJS).

Postscript option (but no longer sold by HP).

Also speaks HP-GL/2.

Probably also works with color ljet driver.

Reputed to be poor for photos, although this is bound to be better with the "gimp-print"/"stp" driver.

Consumables/Refills: four cartridges: Y,M,C, and B
